object.name: BulletShotNPC
object.desc: Battle intensity added wen a npc is shooting

field.name: fBulletShotPlayer
field.desc: Battle intensity added when the player is shooting

object.name: Explosion
object.desc: Battle intensity added when there is an explosion

object.name: BulletHitNPC
object.desc: Battle intensity added when a bullet shot by a npc hit something around the player

object.name: BulletHitPlayer
object.desc: Battle intensity added when a bullet shot by the player hit something around him

field.name: fBulletPassBy
field.desc: Battle intensity added when a bullet pass near enough to the player to ear a bulelt passby

field.name: fBulletDamage
field.desc: Battle intensity added when a bullet hit the player and causes damage to him

field.name: fBufferTime
field.desc: The battle intensity is reset to 0 after that time in sec.

field.name: fBufferDepletionPerSecond
field.desc: Amount of battle intensity drained per second when moving to a smaller battle intensity.

field.name: fBufferIncreasePerSecond
field.desc: Amount of battle intensity added per second when moving to a larger battle intensity.

field.name: fTargetDepletePerBufferCheck
field.desc: Amount removed from the target battle intensity level when the buffer is less than the current level..
